name: convert_to_points
attributes: # [doc = " 保有中の NFT 枚数に応じたポイントを累積更新します。"]
# [doc = " - `point_rate`: 1 枚あたりの付与ポイント"]
body: let count = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . point_data ;
data . total = data . total . checked_add (minted) . unwrap () ;
data . last_earned = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 利用者アカウント（署名チェックを省略）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保有枚数を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: point_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ポイントデータを保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"points" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 8 + 8)]
